name: Article
description:
An article, such as a news article or piece of investigative report. Newspapers and magazines have articles of many different types and this is intended to cover them all.

See also blog post.
title: Article

fields.name: pagination
fields.title: pagination
fields.description: Any description of pages that is not separated into pageStart and pageEnd; for example, "1-6, 9, 55" or "10-12, 46-49".

fields.name: pageEnd
fields.title: pageEnd
fields.description: The page on which the work ends; for example "138" or "xvi".

fields.name: articleSection
fields.title: articleSection
fields.description: Articles may belong to one or more 'sections' in a magazine or newspaper, such as Sports, Lifestyle, etc.

fields.name: wordCount
fields.title: wordCount
fields.description: The number of words in the text of the Article.

fields.name: articleBody
fields.title: articleBody
fields.description: The actual body of the article.

fields.name: pageStart
fields.title: pageStart
fields.description: The page on which the work starts; for example "135" or "xiii".
